info.description: This API provides access to the REST-based opearations that allow to query and manipulate various entities managed by the OpenTOSCA container, as well as to execute certain operations on it.
info.title: Swagger API for OpenTOSCA Container

get.summary: Gets the root resource
Gets all CSARs

post.summary: Handles an upload request for a CSAR file

204.description: Created - The CSAR has been successfully created and its location is returned as the value of the location header

get.summary: Gets a given CSAR
Gets links to all files and directories contained in this CSAR
Gets all service templates of a CSAR
Gets a specific service templates identified by its qualified name

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets boundary definitions for a given service template
Gets interfaces of a service tempate

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets an interface of a service template specified by its name

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets properties of a service tempate

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets build plans of a service template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets a build plan by its id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets build plan instances of a build plan.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

200.description: Successful Operation - A URL to the plan instance.

get.summary: Gets a build plan instance by its id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

404.description: Not Found - Plan instance not found

get.summary: Gets all log entries assocaited with the specified plan instance

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

404.description: Not Found - Plan instance not found

post.summary: Adds an entry to the log associated with the plan instance

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: log entry to be added (either as a JSON construct, or in the form <log> log-entry </log>)

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

200.description: Successful Operation - A URL to the plan instance logs resource

400.description: Bad Request - Empty log entry given.

404.description: Not Found - Plan instance not found

get.summary: Gets the current state of a build plan instance

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

404.description: Not Found - Plan instance not found

put.summary: Changes the current state of a build plan instance

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The new state of the build plan instance, possible values include "RUNNING", "FINISHED", "FAILED", "UNKNOWN"

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

400.description: Bad Request - The given plan instance state is invalid

404.description: Not Found - Plan instance not found

get.summary: Get all instances of a service template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

post.summary: Creates a new service template instance that corresponds to an existing build plan instance identified with a correlation id. The instance will be in the INITIAL state and will contain initial set of properties retrieved from the boundary definitions of the corresponding service template.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The correlation id that corresponds to the build plan instance that created this service template instance

200.description: Successful Operation - A URL to the created service template instance

400.description: Bad Request - The format of the request is invalid, or the plan instance with the given correlation id is already associated with an existing service template instance

404.description: Not Found - The service template and/or the build plan instances cannot be found

get.summary: Get a service template instance by id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

delete.summary: Deletes a service template instance by id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets management plans of a service template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets a management plan by its id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets management plan instances of a management plan.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

200.description: Successful Operation - A URL to the plan instance.

get.summary: Gets a management plan instance by its id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

404.description: Not Found - Plan instance not found

get.summary: Gets all log entries assocaited with the specified plan instance

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

404.description: Not Found - Plan instance not found

post.summary: Adds an entry to the log associated with the plan instance

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: log entry to be added (either as a plain text, or in the form <log> log-entry </log>)

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

200.description: Successful Operation - A URL to the plan instance logs resource

400.description: Bad Request - Empty log entry given.

404.description: Not Found - Plan instance not found

get.summary: Gets the current state of a management plan instance

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

404.description: Not Found - Plan instance not found

put.summary: Changes the current state of a management plan instance

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The new state of the management plan instance, possible values include "RUNNING", "FINISHED", "FAILED", "UNKNOWN"

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

400.description: Bad Request - The given plan instance state is invalid

404.description: Not Found - Plan instance not found

get.summary: Get the set of properties of a service template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

put.summary: Changes the set of properties of a service template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: an xml representation of the set of properties

200.description: Successful Operation - A URI to the properties resource

400.description: Bad Request - The set of properties is malformed

404.description: Not Found - The service template instance cannot be found

get.summary: Get the state of a service template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

put.summary: Changes the state of a service template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the new state of the node template instance, possible values are (INITIAL, CREATING, CREATED, DELETING, DELETED, ERROR)

400.description: Bad Request - The state is invalid

404.description: Not Found - The service template instance cannot be found

get.summary: Gets all node templates of a specific service template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets a specific node template by its id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Get all instances of a node template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

post.summary: Creates a new node template instance that belongs to a specific service template instance

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the id of the service template instance that the created node template instance will belong to

200.description: Successful Operation - A URL to the created node template instance

400.description: Bad Request - The format of the service template instance id is invalid

404.description: Not Found - The service template instance and/or the node template cannot be found

get.summary: Gets a node template instance by id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the node template instance

delete.summary: Deletes a node template instance by id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the node template instance

get.summary: Get the set of properties of a node template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the node template instance

put.summary: Changes the set of properties of a node template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the node template instance

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: an xml representation of the set of properties

200.description: Successful Operation - A URI to the properties resource

400.description: Bad Request - The set of properties is malformed

404.description: Not Found - The node template instance cannot be found

get.summary: Get a single property of a node template instance identified by its id and the name of the property.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the node template instance

parameters.name: propname
parameters.description: name of the node template instance property

put.summary: Changes the set of properties of a node template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the node template instance

parameters.name: propname
parameters.description: name of the node template instance property

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: an xml representation of the set of properties

200.description: Successful Operation - A URI to the properties resource

400.description: Bad Request - The set of properties is malformed

404.description: Not Found - The node template instance cannot be found

get.summary: Gets the state of a node template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the node template instance

put.summary: Changes the state of a node template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the node template instance

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the new state of the node template instance, possible values are (INITIAL, CREATING, CREATED, CONFIGURING, CONFIGURED, STARTING, STARTED, STOPPING, STOPPED, DELETING, DELETED, ERROR)

400.description: Bad Request - The state is invalid

404.description: Not Found - The node template instance cannot be found

get.summary: Gets all relationship templates of a specific service template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets a specific relationship template by its id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets all instances of a relationship template

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

post.summary: Creates a new relationship template instance that connects two given node template instances

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the request data containing the source and the target node instance id's

200.description: Successful Operation - A URL to the created node template instance

400.description: Bad Request - The format of the request is invalid, or it is missing data

404.description: Not Found - The relationship template and/or the node template instances cannot be found

get.summary: Gets a relationship template instance by id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

delete.summary: Deletes a relationship template instance by id

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

get.summary: Gets the set of properties of a relationship template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

put.summary: Changes the set of properties of a relationship template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: an xml representation of the set of properties

200.description: Successful Operation - A URI to the properties resource

400.description: Bad Request - The set of properties is malformed

404.description: Not Found - The relationship template instance cannot be found

get.summary: Gets the state of a relationship template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

put.summary: Changes the state of a relationship template instance identified by its id.

parameters.name: servicetemplate
parameters.description: qualified name of the service template

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the new state of the node template instance, possible values are (INITIAL, CREATING, CREATED, DELETING, DELETED, ERROR)

400.description: Bad Request - The state is invalid

404.description: Not Found - The relationship template instance cannot be found
